alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hardin County through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olive Hill, or 10 miles northeast of Savannah, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olive Hill, Swift, Olivehill, Bucktown and Cerro Gordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
